title: Problem with clubs
body:
Basically, after clubs was kinda fixed i can't see the club that i created. Users in that club can still see me offline thou even if i am online. WTF?
Ty for your time

replies.body: We've been investigating these issues since clubs were restored after some [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  We don't have any eta just now on a fix, but we're working towards a solution.  Hang tight!
